title: I.Sicily inscription 000633
support: A marble plaque broken into four joining fragments, with the lower left quarter and centre now lost.

layout.p: six lines of Greek, carefully laid out along guielines.

handNote.lettering: lunate letters, with extensive use of ligature and occasional small letters mid-line.

provenanceFound._: Original discovery not recorded, described by Kaibel as 'in museo'.

provenanceObserved._: Noted in the storeroom of Messina Museum, 2017.

facsimile.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana
